mapper.select:
select mi.id, mi.code, mi.name, mi.content, mi.model, mi.images, mi.del_flag, mi.create_date, mi.`type`, mi.measurement_unit from materials_info mi where 1 = 1
AND mi.name like CONCAT("%",#{queryForm.name},"%")
AND mi.code like CONCAT("%",#{queryForm.code},"%")
AND mi.code like CONCAT("%",#{queryForm.model},"%")
AND mi.type like CONCAT("%",#{queryForm.type},"%")
order by mi.create_date desc
